article_title: Darren Curtis Sixth Man Charged In September's Mass Shooting In Chicago That Injured 3-Year-Old
article_text: Pictures of the suspects charged in last Thursday's mass shooting at Cornell Square Park are put on display during a press conference at police headquarters on September 24, 2013 in Chicago, Illinois. The four men charged are Kewane Gatewood, 20, Bryon Champ, 21, Brad Jett, 22, and Tabari Young, 22. Police believe the shooting was carried out in retaliation for an unreported shooting earlier in the day when Champ received a graze wound. (Photo by Scott Olson/Getty Images)

The four men charged are Kewane Gatewood, 20, Bryon Champ, 21, Brad Jett, 22, and Tabari Young, 22.
Police believe the shooting was carried out in retaliation for an unreported shooting earlier in the day when Champ received a graze wound.
Pictures of the suspects charged in last Thursday's mass shooting at Cornell Square Park are put on display during a press conference at police headquarters on September 24, 2013 in Chicago, Illinois.
